idea-plugin.name: Files Copier
idea-plugin.description:
Files Copier is a simple yet powerful productivity tool for JetBrains IDEs. It allows you to copy the content of selected files or folders directly to your clipboard in a custom, structured format. Key features:
  • Supports multiple file and folder selections from the Project View.
  • Recursively traverses directories and copies all file contents.
  • Preserves project-relative file paths for clear context.
  • Adds automatic line breaks between files for readability.
  • Accessible from the Project View popup menu and the Navigation Toolbar.
This plugin is ideal for developers who need to quickly share code snippets, export multiple files for AI assistance, or prepare code reviews efficiently.

action.description: Copy files content in custom format
